Paragraph: Among applicators with usage information sufficient to evaluate exposure - response patterns , we used Poisson regression to estimate adjusted rate ratios ( RRs ) and 95 % CI for cancer sites with > 10 exposed cases for both lifetime ( LT ) exposure days and intensity - weighted ( IW ) lifetime exposure days ( accounting for factors impacting exposure ) .
